statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureRole)<-[:ASSUME_ROLE]-(m)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: {AZURE_TENANT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureRole)<-[r:ASSUME_ROLE]-(m)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: {AZURE_TENANT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AzureRole)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: {AZURE_TENANT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureRole)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: {AZURE_TENANT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
